TITLE: Episode 112 - Eyes Cocked and Doors Locked with Jack Luna [Adult Language]
DESCRIPTION: This week, we are joined by our favorite storyteller in True Crime, Jack Luna. From his work on Dark Topic, Monstruo, and 9-1-1 Calls with the Operator, Jack has done extensive work in telling the stories that reveal the monstrousness of humanity. As a family man with a long list of anecdotes to draw from, he is the best to hear tell these tales.
